text: @SpeakerPelosi What is @SpeakerPelosi doing to protect the homeless in her district from Coronavirus? Especially vulnerable to rapid transmission & poor healthcare N Pelosi's constituents require extra protections which have not been implemented. Is this Pelosi's cruel way to end homelessness?
